label: description:
documentation: "Short info on the purpose of this scheme"

label: schema_license:
documentation: "License information for using this superscheme and the derived scheme"

label: license:
documentation: "CC BY-ND 4.0 - Mandatory Creative Commons license condition"

label: attribution:
default: Ronald Broeke (c) 2017-2019 - Mandatory attribution required under the Creative Commons license"

label: pdk_license:
documentation: "License conditions of the content in the YAML."

label: xsections:
documentation: "Contains zero or more cross section definitions."

label: width:
documentation: "Define the default width of a structure in this xsection <xsection_name>."

label: width_min:
documentation: "Define the minimum width of a structure in this xsection <xsection_name>."

label: radius:
documentation: "Define the default radius of a structure in this xsection <xsection_name>."

label: radius_min:
documentation: "Define the minimum radius of a structure in this xsection <xsection_name>."

label: models:
documentation: "Contains zero or more compact models for xsection <xsection_name>."

label: id:
documentation: "Reference to the unique ID used for this block across PDK version."

label: version:
documentation: "BB version number set by the foundry."

label: cellname:
documentation: "Cellname of the BB. If no cellname label is found

label: doc:
documentation: "Short sentence to describe the BB to the user."

label: bbox:
default: y) defining the bbox outline as a polygon. The polygon does not have to be closed."

label: bb_width:
documentation: "Width of the BB cell in um."

label: bb_length:
documentation: "Length of the BB cell in um."

label: pin_in:
documentation: "Name of default input pin of the BB."

label: pin_out:
documentation: "Name of default output pin of the BB."

label: pins:
documentation: "Contains one or more pin definitions for <block_name>."

label: direction:
documentation: "pin direction of xya w.r.t. the block; outward 'out' or inward 'in'."

label: radius:
documentation: "radius of curvature at pin (0 or null is no curvature)."

label: parameters:
documentation: "Pcell only. Contains one or more BB parameter definitions."

label: keywordparameters:
documentation: "List of <parameter_name> used in the BB function call (subset of parameters). If the label is not present
default: all parameters are considered to be keyword parameters."

label: cellnameparameters:
documentation: "List of <parameter_name> for more descriptive cell names (subset of keywordparameters)."

label: call:
documentation: "name of function call that creates the BB"

label: function:
documentation: "Name of the function that returns a cell with the icon."

label: parameters:
documentation: "Parameters for which default will be overridden."

label: length:
documentation: "Icon length in the x-direction in um."

label: width:
documentation: "Icon length in the y-direction in um."

label: angle:
documentation: "angle DRC rule for instantiation w.r.t the mask"

label: angle_mirror:
documentation: "angle DRC rule for instantiation w.r.t the mask with mirroring status"

label: flip:
documentation: "group rules that apply for a flip=true state"

label: noflip:
documentation: "group rules that apply for a flip=false state"

label: pgp_key:
documentation: "Hash of public pgp key used to encrypt the IP-Block."
